articles.author: Paul Moore
articles.title: Galway restaurant is named best pizza takeaway in Europe - Irish Mirror
articles.description: Dough Bros was recognised by 50 Top Pizza
articles.content:
The Dough Bros in Galway city has been named the best pizza takeaway in Europe by 50 Top Pizza.
The prestigious outlet frequently publishes guides to the best pizzerias across the world, as chosen b… [+2247 chars]
